name: The First Star
description:
Accompany Hoshiko, a 16 year old high school student as she struggles to take care of her sick mother, go to school, maintain a job and maybe even find true love, all while avoiding the shadow of her stalker.

The game contains 17,533 words and 6 total endings.

Warning: Strong language and dark endings

Credits:

tokudaya, incompetech, tropicalmonsoon, mugenjohncel, osumashi of freshwater clam, soundbible, vanille velasquez, sound jay
